column2: Boffin}}</ref> She married [[Adalbert Bolger]] and had one son, [[Filibert Bolger

column1: Gerda is a name of the goddess [[Wikipedia:Gerðr
column2: Gerðr]], an [[Old Norse]] name meaning "fenced-in".<ref>Orchard, Andy (1997). ''Dictionary of Norse Myth and Legend'' p. 54</ref>
